# ProgressViewStyle.Configuration

**Type Alias**

A type alias for the properties of a progress view instance.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Configuration = ProgressViewStyleConfiguration
```

## Creating custom progress view styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view representing the body of a progress view.
- **Body**: A view representing the body of a progress view.

items.description: Creates a view representing the body of a progress view.
